com.naef.jnlua
Class JavaModule

java.lang.Object
  com.naef.jnlua.JavaModule

public class JavaModule
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the Java module for Lua. The Java module contains Java functions for using Java in Lua.

Method Summary
static JavaModule getInstance()
          Returns the instance of the Java module.
 void open(LuaState luaState)
          Opens this module in a Lua state.
 TypedJavaObject toTable(java.util.List<?> list)
          Returns a table-like Lua value for the specified list.

          Returns a table-like Lua value for the specified map.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getInstance

public static JavaModule getInstance()
Returns the instance of the Java module.

Returns:
the instance

open

public void open(LuaState luaState)
Opens this module in a Lua state. The method is invoked by LuaState.openLibs() or by LuaState.openLib(com.naef.jnlua.LuaState.Library) if LuaState.Library.JAVA is passed.

Parameters:
luaState - the Lua state to open in

toTable

public TypedJavaObject toTable(java.util.Map<?,?> map)
Returns a table-like Lua value for the specified map. The returned value corresponds to the return value of the totable() function provided by this Java module.

Parameters:
map - the map
Returns:
the table-like Lua value

toTable

public TypedJavaObject toTable(java.util.List<?> list)
Returns a table-like Lua value for the specified list. The returned value corresponds to the return value of the totable() function provided by this Java module.

Parameters:
list - the list
Returns:
the table-like Lua value
